title: The Top 10 Wide Receivers For The 2022 Season
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss the top 10 wide receivers for the 2022 season, Keenan Allen not making that list, franchise-tagged players without long term deals and N’keal Harry being traded to the Bears. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: N'keal Harry traded from the Patriots to the Bears and the top 10 wide receivers for the 2022 season.
